messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-playground

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go-playground/source/detail?r=ccbafc7a57e5 ***

go-playground: add page title

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6099048

LGTM

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

subject: code review 6099048: go-playground: add page title
